Albout

Hi, I’m Nathan, a hobbyist with interests in artwork, typesetting, web and graphic design. I’m also studying computer engineering at Christopher Newport University, and am hard at work earning a minor in leadership studies in the President’s Leadership Program.

Personality

I am still regularly taking personality tests and adding results as I encounter them.

I have taken the Meyers-Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI) once in 2011 and show INTP preferences.
